programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - Lost Anniversary/ Checked Out
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 For Detectives Ayanna Corbin and Mike Cochran, this case starts off on the wrong foot. Barbara Naklicki holds off a full two days before reporting the disappearance of her husband, Ed, under the mistaken belief that she needed to wait.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - Tangled Web / Street Justice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Detectives Laura Skrip and Joe Struck hunt for a man after his family receives a threat to his life. They must sort through the missing man's troubled family situation and possible drug connections.

programme.title: Marcia Clark Investigates The First 48 - Billionaire Boys Club
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 7 World famous prosecutor, Marcia Clark, investigates one of the world's most infamous cases: The Billionaire Boys Club. Was the leader of the club, Joe Hunt, so obsessed with money and power that he became a cold-blooded killer?

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - 3:10 To Yuma/Harm's Way
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Detective Pam Childs responds to the disappearance of Maria Miranda reported by Hector, the missing woman's boyfriend and the father of her infant child. Hector explains he received a phone call from Maria in which she complained of being tired.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - The Good Mother
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 Missing persons detectives Pam Childs and John Smith catch the case of Nellie Litvinova, who disappeared a few hours after her daughter brought her home from a doctor's appointment. The doctor had given Nellie an injection of pain medication.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - The Good Mother
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 Missing persons detectives Pam Childs and John Smith catch the case of Nellie Litvinova, who disappeared a few hours after her daughter brought her home from a doctor's appointment. The doctor had given Nellie an injection of pain medication.

programme.title: The First 48 - Hale Storm
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 10 In Louisville, a sleeping family awakens to a barrage of bullets from a machine gun, leaving two young boys injured and a teenager dead. With no eyewitnesses, Detective Mickey Cohn must resort to old-fashioned detective work.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Abnormals (#449)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 47 In Mobile, the homicide team takes on a missing person's case when new evidence points to foul play.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Invitation
programme.desc: Season 17, Episode 29 When a young man is shot to death at a motel party, Tulsa Detective Justin Ritter discovers a photo posted on Facebook may have triggered a dangerous chain of events.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Tempered / The Bully
programme.desc: Season 17, Episode 30 In Atlanta, a caretaker is gunned down over a grudge. And in Tulsa, a young man loses his life when a bully goes too far.

programme.title: The First 48 - Runner Runner (#355)
programme.desc: Season 19, Episode 2 In Mobile, when a quick money scam ends in a double murder, a rookie homicide detective takes it personally.

programme.title: The First 48 - Risky Business (#270 B)
programme.desc: Season 19, Episode 97 In Dallas, after a robbery that left one man dead and another severely wounded, Detective Steve David needs to track down two killers before they strike again.

programme.title: The First 48 - Deadly Secret (#275 A)
programme.desc: Season 19, Episode 98 In Dallas, when a young father is gunned down in front of his house, Detective Steve David discovers that the victim had a secret that may have led to his murder.

programme.title: The First 48 - Hale Storm
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 10 In Louisville, a sleeping family awakens to a barrage of bullets from a machine gun, leaving two young boys injured and a teenager dead. With no eyewitnesses, Detective Mickey Cohn must resort to old-fashioned detective work.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Abnormals (#449)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 47 In Mobile, the homicide team takes on a missing person's case when new evidence points to foul play.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Empire of Blood
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 A mutilated corpse prompts a sweeping investigation into a deadly cartel.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Road to Ruin
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 A hard-working family man is shot to death while doing a favor for friend.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Loose Cannon
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 A mother of three is gunned down just steps from her front door.

programme.title: The First 48 - Devils Trail
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 8 In Tulsa, detectives have little to go on when they find the naked body of an unknown homeless woman who was raped, strangled to death, and thrown into a dumpster.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Break Up/ No Good Deed
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 9 A young woman in Mobile is found dead behind an abandoned building, and detectives need her boyfriend to help solve the case. A young father's murder case sends Atlanta detectives to the Poconos Mountains in search of his killers.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Final Investment
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 When a robbery goes bad in south Memphis, one man is dead and very little physical evidence is left at the scene.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Lester Street One Hour Version
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 In September of 2010, Jessie Dotson went on trial for one of the worst mass murders in Memphis history. He wasn't accused of killing strangers--he was brother, friend, and uncle to the six people he'd allegedly murdered.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Hale Storm
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A Louisville, Kentucky family awakes before dawn as a barrage of gunfire rips through their home. When the smoke clears, three teenage boys are bleeding from bullet wounds.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Bad Company
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 On a warm, clear night in the desert near Lake Mead, the body of a man--shot dead--was found in the middle of the road. When Las Vegas Metro homicide detectives began investigating the death, they had no idea the case would lead them to a conspiracy.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Craigslist Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 106 The story of how police managed to stop a most unlikely killer, who appeared to be embarking on a bold crime spree, and how digital forensics, and good old fashioned police work led to arrest.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Serial Killer of Baton Rouge
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 107 On May 31st 2002, Charlotte Murray Pace was found stabbed to death in her home in Sharlo, Baton Rouge. DNA evidence was so strong that the prosecutor decided to hang the whole case on it.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Butcher of Louisiana
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 108 The story of how a deeply disturbed and twisted serial killer was stopped in his tracks by the tire mark he left at the scene of one of his crimes.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Murder of Gemma McCluskie
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 109 The body of Eastenders actress, Gemma McCluskie was discovered in the Regents canal in 2012. Dogged detective work and detailed forensic examination eventually led police to her killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Road Rage Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 110 Tracie Andrews witnessed the murder of her boyfriend, in a country lane in 1996, but all was not what it seemed. Within weeks the spotlight turned on Tracie herself.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Most Toys
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 170 When transporting a dangerous material to the Enterprise, Data is kidnapped and the crew is led to believe he is dead when the shuttlecraft he was piloting explodes enroute.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Sarek
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 171 Legendary Federation ambassador Sarek visits the Enterprise to conclude peace talks with a race called the Legarans.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Menage a Troi
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 172 When Deanna's mother spurns advances made by a Ferengi Daimon, he takes it upon himself to kidnap the two of them, along with Commander Riker and steal them away aboard his ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Transfigurations
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 173 The Enterprise finds a deserted planet where a ship has crashed, and, with it, the lone survivor with no memory, but extraordinary healing powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Best of Both Worlds (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 174 Responding to a distress call on one of the Federation's outer-most colonies, the Enterprise arrives...only to find a big hole in the ground where the town used to be, and discovers the Borg are behind the attack.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Best of Both Worlds (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 175 Commander Riker had no choice as acting captain but fire full force on the Borg starship, despite Picard being on board of it, altered to a Borg calling himself Locutus, both ships are damaged.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Suddenly Human
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 176 On a rescue mission to an alien shipwrecked training mission, they discover one of its trainees to be a human.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Brothers
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 177 After an accident aboard the Enterprise leaves one of its children in grave danger, Data commandeers the Enterprise, driven to take him to an unknown origin, where an interesting figures awaits.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Family
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 178 After defeating the Borg, the crew of the Enterprise experiences shore leave in various ways. Captain Picard's return to his family's vineyard in France has some extraordinary repercussions following his time spent as a member of the Borg collective.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Remember Me
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 179 Dr. Crusher's fear of losing loved ones becomes real when her worries create an alternate reality.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Legacy
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Reunion
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 181 When the head of the Klingon high council passes on, Picard finds himself in the middle of the struggle for the now-vacant position. Meanwhile, Worf re-unites with a past love, only to find he now has a son.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Future Imperfect
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 182 Riker has to quit his birthday party during a so-far uneventful patrol voyage at the Neutral Zone to head an away team when a Romulan secret base is found on a planet which was believed uninhabited.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Final Mission
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 183 Before leaving for Starfleet Academy, Wesley Crusher accompanies Captain Picard on a dangerous mission.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Once Upon a Time
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 Woodrow, a janitor living in the year 1890, accidentally activates a time traveling helmet which transports him to 1962 - then promptly breaks down.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Five Characters in Search of an Exit
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 A hobo, clown, bagpipe player, ballerina and military officer are trapped in a huge cylinder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Quality of Mercy
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 A gung-ho young soldier gets a new viewpoint on war when he inexplicably changes places with a Japanese officer trying to stop his superior from leading a charge against American forces.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nothing in the Dark
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death."

programme.title: Flight 7500 - Flight 7500
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A flight from Los Angeles to Tokyo is rocked by turbulence—and a terrifying force is unleashed in this spine-chilling journey into fear from the director of The Grudge.

programme.title: The Infinite World of H.G. Wells - Episode 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Brings H.G. Wells' visions to life with an inventive speculation on the origins of his brilliant flights of fantasy.

programme.title: The Infinite World of H.G. Wells - Episode 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Brings H.G. Wells' visions to life with an inventive speculation on the origins of his brilliant flights of fantasy.

programme.title: The Infinite World of H.G. Wells - Episode 3
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Brings H.G. Wells' visions to life with an inventive speculation on the origins of his brilliant flights of fantasy.

programme.title: Evinced - Evinced
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A fledgling lawman & his reporter wife must contend with a freaky & surreptitious oracle figure whose gruesome predictions continue to inexplicably transpire.

programme.title: I'll Follow You Down - I'll Follow You Down
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After a scientist disappears during a business trip, his son (Haley Joel Osment) and wife (Gillian Anderson) struggle to cope, then they make a bizarre discovery years later that may bring him home.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 110 - When Justice Fails
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 RoboCop and Officer Madigan race to save the lives of four astronauts as they go head-to-head against a flamboyant corporate raider who values profits more than safety.

programme.desc: Season 1, This holiday season is full of laugh out loud goodness; counting down some of the best gift-giving, Christmas tree mishaps, and Santa blunders.

programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Class is in session and it's time to laugh and learn from fails of the past, or be doomed to repeat them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Spirit Folk
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 17 The Voyager crew makes first contact with a holodeck program.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Ashes To Ashes
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 18 Claiming to be a long-dead crewmember, an alien requests asylum on Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Child's Play
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 19 The Voyager crew must rescue a young boy being used as a weapon of destruction against the Borg

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 20 Janeway must tend to her flock when she finds three misfit crewmembers need some special attention.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Live Fast And Prosper
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 21 Impostors jeopardize Voyager's good reputation in the Delta Quadrant.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Muse
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 22 Stranded during an away mission, B'Elanna finds herself the inspiration for a young poet's art.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Fury
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 23 An old friend returns with a decidedly unfriendly plot to destroy Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Life Line
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 24 The Doctor seizes an opportunity to save the life of the man who created him.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Haunting Of Deck Twelve
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 25 Neelix recounts the harrowing tale of Voyager's newest uninvited guest.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unimatrix Zero, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 26 Captain Janeway faces her biggest battle yet against the Borg—assimilation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unimatrix Zero, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 1 Seven's long-lost love lures Janeway into a deadly encounter with the Borg Queen.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Imperfection
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 2 A malfunction in Seven's cortical node threatens to destroy her.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Drive
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 3 Tom and B'Elanna's relationship could be the loser when Tom enters a race.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Repression
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 4 Tuvok's investigation of a series of mysterious attacks aboard Voyager leads him to a most unlikely suspect: himself.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 21
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 21 This episode includes: UD: Roswell/Area 51 and Abductees.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 7 This episode includes: St. James' Ghost, Ghostly Attraction, Where Is She Now? and Calling Dr. Fraud & UD

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 7 This episode includes: Jesse James Hollywood & UD, Rider Down & UD, Bad Dad and Picture Kristen Gone.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 This episode includes: Falcon Lake UFO, Inside Frontera, UD: Loving's Lost Love and Disappearing Dad.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 20
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 20 This episode includes: Edgar Cayce, Crystal and War of the Depues & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 16 This episode includes: Gasparetto, Tara! Tara! Tara!, Fritz and the Soldiers & UD, UD: Log Cabin Fraud and Carlos' Con & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 21
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 This episode includes: Casolaro, If the Truth Be Known & UD, Rest Stop Killer and Purvis Confession & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 This episode includes: Update: Where's Kari?, Amelia Earhart (Pts. 1 & 2), Richard's Rampage & UD and Miami Vice & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 This episode includes: Point Blank, Searcher's Son, Update: Witch Hunt, Nashville Hit and Silent Testimony.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 This episode includes: Dear Patricia & UD, Lucie's Last Fare & UD, Unknown Mom & UD and Little Miss Panasoffkee & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 2
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 This episode includes: Bermuda Triangle, Prison Mom & UD, Heck He's Gone & UD and Scare Tactics.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 1
programme.desc: Season 12, Episode 1 This episode includes: Burning Bed, Freshwater Runs Still & UD, Starfyre Fugitive & UD, Vanished in the Heartland & UD and Update: Sweet Sue.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 11
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 This episode includes: Polio & UD, Missing Gringo, UD: Lucky Lost Love, Poison Shake & UD and UD: Goldie's Girl.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 20
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 20 This episode includes: Dutch Shultz Treasure, Computer Con Killer, Lost Lauren and Mother/Son Murder & UD.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: King Dinosaur - King Dinosaur
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 In King Dinosaur, the crew pokes fun as scientists are terrorized by snakes, bugs, and dinosaurs on a newly discovered planet.

programme.title: MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze - MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).

programme.title: MST3K: The Sinister Urge - MST3K: The Sinister Urge
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two laid back detectives crack down on an underground porn ring while Frank threatens to blow up Deep 13.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - What to Do on a Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 108 Nick wants to take Kay out on a date, but isn't sure what they'd do. The short offers ideas like taffy pulls and scavenger sales. Nothing says romantic quite like a scavenger sale.

programme.title: MST3K: Zombie Nightmare - MST3K: Zombie Nightmare
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula - MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 - Boggy Creek II: And The Legend Continues
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 6 A professor and his students camp out in the rural Arkansas swamp, in hopes of finding a Bigfoot-like creature.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: Undersea Kingdom - Chapter 2: The Undersea City
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 The second installment of the undersea adventure to Atlantis.

programme.title: Angel's Revenge - Angel's Revenge
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 22 Seven women fight drug dealers.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Selling Wizard
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 The Satellite of Love crew take on a short about grocery store freezers.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hellcats - Hellcats
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 Joel and the 'bots attempt to puzzle out what's going on in the unintelligible biker film, The Hellcats (1968). Flashbacks from earlier episodes fill out the host segments.

programme.title: Missing Pieces - Missing Pieces
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Notes From the Heart Healer - Notes From the Heart Healer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When recently married Peyton finds herself a caregiver to an abandoned baby, it awakens a desire in her to be a mother. Husband King, however, is not so sure about starting a new family. The third installment The Note.

programme.title: November Christmas - November Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 With the support of his small town, a father's wish for his very sick daughter is realized. Stars Sam Elliott, John Corbett, and Sarah Paulson. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve - One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Anne Heche stars as a recently-divorced mom who wants her two kids' first Christmas without dad to be perfect. An entertaining but unfortunate series of Christmas Eve mishaps ensures that won't happen.

programme.title: Northpole - Northpole
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a loss of togetherness spreads across the globe and threatens the existence of Santa's Northpole, a little boy named Kevin is called upon to save the day.

programme.title: Candles on Bay Street - Candles on Bay Street
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Sam and Lydia have a great marriage. They're committed to each other, and to their veterinary practice. But when Sam's high school flame comes back to town, it's a time of tension for everybody.

programme.title: Beyond the Blackboard - Beyond the Blackboard
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A 24-year-old first-time teacher overcomes her initial fears and prejudices to make a difference in the lives of the homeless children she teaches in a shelter's makeshift classroom. Stars Emily VanCamp.

programme.title: The Russell Girl - The Russell Girl
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Sarah Russell, the picture-perfect girl next door, took a job in Chicago thinking she could escape memories of a tragic accident that she blames herself for. But when she receives some unsettling news, Sarah returns home.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Message In A Bottle
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A seemingly harmless orb from a dead world is brought back to the base through the Stargate, but the strange device infects O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) with an alien organism. Now, the only chance to save him is to let the organism control him!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Family
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 SG-1 goes on a mission to rescue Teal'c's son, Rya'c, from the grasp of Apophis. But, when they finally reach Rya'c, he doesn't want to be saved -- he's been brainwashed and has accepted Apophis as his god! Can Teal'c find a way to win back his son?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Secrets
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 The Stargate project is imperiled when a reporter threatens to expose the top-secret portal. O'Neill attempts to stop him while the rest of the team tries to save Jackson's wife who has been impregnated with a Goa'uld. Is this the end of Stargate?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Bane
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 A giant insect has bitten Teal'c (Christopher Judge) and soon his body will transform into a cocoon and give birth to hundreds of insect aliens. Can the SG-1 team capture one of the bugs, extract the venom and save Teal'c before it's too late?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Tok'ra, The - Part 1
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 Captain Carter unwillingly becomes the host to a dying Tok'ra, a member of the resistance whose noble goal is to overthrow the evil Goa'uld empire. Now she sees through the Tok'ra's eyes, but can her visions help the SG-1 team save the Tok'ra?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Tok'ra, The - Part 2
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 The Tok'ra are desperate for hosts so they can continue fighting the Goa'uld. Carter's father, who is dying of cancer, has nothing to lose by volunteering his body. But will he die during the transference...or does fate have something else in store?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Spirits
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 SG-11 vanishes while negotiating the mining rights on a planet inhabited by a tribe known as the Salish. Can the SG-1 team find their lost colleagues without angering the planet's mystical spirits...or will they become their next victims?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Touchstone
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 A climate-controlling touchstone is stolen from planet Madrona, causing the weather to rapidly deteriorate. And when the SG-1 team is accused of the theft, O'Neill must pursue the real thief and rescue the missing stone before Madrona perishes.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Critical Mass
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Grace Under Pressure
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 While testing a newly repaired puddle jumper, McKay and Captain Hugh Griffin suddenly lose control of the ship and crash into the ocean. As the jumper begins to sink slowly towards the bottom of the ocean, Griffin sacrifices himself to save McKay.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Tower
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Sheppard and the team discover a world that has technology created by the Ancients. But the planet's royal family does not allow anyone but them to harness the technology and treat the villagers with little dignity.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Long Goodbye
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 The team discover two life pods floating in space. Upon further investigation, the team accidentally transfers the minds of the individuals into Sheppard and Weir. Things get worse when the team discovers the two people are out to destroy the other.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Coup D'Etat
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 Col. Sheppard's team is urgently summoned to M1K-177, where Maj. Lorne's team has been attacked. When Sheppard and his unit arrive, however, all they find is a burned building containing charred bodies: presumably, Lorne and his men.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Michael
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 Lt. Kenmore wakes up in the infirmary without his memory. He begins to think there is something wrong when his nightmares about being a Wraith seem to be more than real. His fears would be unfounded if not for the serum that turns Wraiths humans.
